description: This sure-to-impress soup recipe is made with roasted tomatoes for loads of hearty flavour. The toasted cheesy olive bread is to die for.
keywords: Roasted Tomato Soup With Toasted Cheesy Olive Bread
name: Roasted Tomato Soup With Toasted Cheesy Olive Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pesto and remaining oil in a small bowl. Top soup with pesto and parsley. Serve with cheesy bread.
